handist.collections.dist

Class OneSidedMoveManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • handist.collections.dist.OneSidedMoveManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MoveManager

    public class OneSidedMoveManager
extends Object
implements MoveManager
    Implementation of MoveManager which provides features to make data transfer at the sole initiative of the sender.
    Author:
    Patrick Finnerty

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected List<DeSerializer> deserializers
      List of deserializers used to process the received data on the destination
      protected apgas.Place destination
      Place to which the objects need to be sent
      protected List<Serializer> serializers
      List of serializers used to transform the objects of the local host into bytes to be sent to the remote host

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OneSidedMoveManager(apgas.Place d)

      void asyncSend()
      Sends the elements that have been requested to this move manager.
      protected static int nextTag()
      Private method used to assign tags for MPI calls.
      protected byte[] prepareByteArray()
      Applies all the serializers accumulated so far and produces a byte array which is going to be transmitted to the destination
      void request(apgas.Place dest, Serializer s, DeSerializer d)
      Submits a pair of serializer and deserializer to the move manager along with the place to which the entries handled by this pair of serializer/deserializer should be transferred to
      void send()
      Sends the elements that have been requested in a synchronous fashion.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OneSidedMoveManager

        public OneSidedMoveManager(apgas.Place d)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        d - the place which will be the destination of all the objects transferred

    • Method Detail

      • nextTag

        protected static int nextTag()
        Private method used to assign tags for MPI calls.
        Returns:
        a safe integer to use as tag

      • asyncSend

        public void asyncSend()
               throws IOException
        Sends the elements that have been requested to this move manager. The elements will be received on the remote host with an asynchronous task registered within the same Finish instance as the calling thread.
        Throws:
        IOException - if thrown during the serialization process

      • prepareByteArray

        protected byte[] prepareByteArray()
                           throws IOException
        Applies all the serializers accumulated so far and produces a byte array which is going to be transmitted to the destination
        Returns:
        a byte array containing the deserializers and the serialized form of the objects that were targeted by the serializers
        Throws:
        IOException - if thrown during serialization of objects

      • request

        public void request(apgas.Place dest,
                    Serializer s,
                    DeSerializer d)
        Description copied from interface: MoveManager
        Submits a pair of serializer and deserializer to the move manager along with the place to which the entries handled by this pair of serializer/deserializer should be transferred to
        Specified by:
        request in interface MoveManager
        Parameters:
        dest - place to which objects should be transferred
        s - serializer which will transform some objects into a byte array
        d - complement to the serializer which will transform a byte array back into the original objects

      • send

        public void send()
          throws IOException
        Sends the elements that have been requested in a synchronous fashion. This method will only return when the remote host has completed the reception of all the objects and has processed all of them with their deserializers
        Throws:
        IOException - if thrown during the serialization process
